title: Brad Dourif
summary: Bradford Claude Dourif[2] (/ˈdɔːrɪf/; born March 18, 1950)[1] is an American actor and teacher. He was nominated for an Oscar, and won a Golden Globe and a BAFTA Award for his supporting role as Billy Bibbit in the film One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975). He is also known for his roles as Charles Lee Ray/Chucky in the Child's Play franchise (1988–present), and Gríma Wormtongue in The Lord of the Rings series (2002–2003).
